structural_unit_name.en: School of Theology and Religious Studies

description.en: In the seminars the different methods of analysing the Biblical texts are studied.
description.et: Seminarides käsitetakse erinevaid piibliteksti analüüsimise viise.

objectives.en: The course describes different contemporary methods of the Biblical hermeneutics and the relations between different approaches.
objectives.et: Kursusel vaadeldakse  mitmesuguseid kaasaegseid piiblitõlgenduse hermeneutilisi meetodeid ja nende omavahelisi seoseid.

learning_outcomes.en: 1. The student is sytematically acquainted with the contemporary methods of Biblical hermeneutics and can describe their possibilities and limits. The student is able to show how the plurality of meanings of the Biblical texts is related to the interpretive methods used to understand them.
learning_outcomes.et: 1. Üliõpilane tunneb süsteemselt piiblihermeneutika kaasaegseid meetodeid ja sõnastab nende võimalused ning piirid. Üliõpilane demonstreerib piibliteksti mitmetähenduslikkust ja selle seotust vastavate tõlgendusviisidega.

learning_outcomes.en: 2. Student analyses the assigned authors' texts;
can outline the content of the texts;
evaluates the reading material and justifies in argumented way his/her evaluation.
learning_outcomes.et: kujundab oma hinnangu loetule ja oskab seda argumenteerida.

description.et:
E - main ideas are of texts understood, presentation vague, personal opinion lacking.
D - texts are understood quite thoroughly, presentation clear, the connections between personal opinion and the texts read are weak.
C - texts are understood thoroughly, presentation clear, personal opinion is based on understanding of the text.
B - texts are understood thoroughly and contextually, presentation clear on both authors and personal opinion, arguments one-sided.
A - presentation gives new insights, is well based on thorough and contextual understanding of texts and their contexts, arguments are clear.

grade_preconditions.et: Participation in lectures and seminars, doing assigned works.

grade_evaluation.et: Participation in lectures and seminars, doing assigned works 100%.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
